attributes.action: Stop Assad killing children in Syria
attributes.additional_details:
Assad is killing 1000's of innocents in Syria. He is using barrel bombs and poisoning children and babies. Please sign this petition to stop these crimes now.
Assad needs to be stopped from committing  genocide to these poor people.
children are losing limbs and are left traumatised, or just dead.
please help me help them.
maybe Assad will understand the power of lots of peoples demands.
